pack.chest_backpacks.description: Changes Beans' Backpacks from a interface similar to bundles to one of chests
key.beansbackpacks.desc.action: Leave unbound to pair this action with the key for %d
key.beansbackpacks.desc.inventory: Leave unbound to pair this action with the key for %d
key.beansbackpacks.desc.instant: Place & pickup Backpacks instantly without right-click; Binding this key disables the %d key
key.beansbackpacks.desc.action_disabled: %d has been disabled because %d is bound
config.beansbackpacks.traits.description:
"Registers new & overrides existing
Trait References to be used with the "beansbackpacks:reference" Component"
config.beansbackpacks.features.descripti:
Enable and disable features for Beans' Backpacks to customize your experience!

Data Packs appear here if in '.../config/beansbackpacks/features'
config.beansbackpacks.shorthand-hud.near: The Shorthand will appear on the Main Hand's side of the Hotbar
config.beansbackpacks.shorthand-hud.far-: The Shorthand will appear in the corner of the Screen on the Main Hand's side
advancement.beansbackpacks.item.name: Items
advancement.beansbackpacks.bundle.desc: Right click to open it's menu
advancement.beansbackpacks.lunch_boxes.d: Stores food which can be eaten while holding the Lunch Box
advancement.beansbackpacks.quiver.name: The Quiver
advancement.beansbackpacks.quiver.desc: Stores Arrows which bows can use while it's in the inventory
advancement.beansbackpacks.alchemy_bag.d: Holds Potions which it instantly uses on a right-click
advancement.beansbackpacks.backpacks.des: Holds many items on the player's back. To store items, right click it while equipped
advancement.beansbackpacks.leather_leggi: Holds 2 stacks of items in their pockets
advancement.beansbackpacks.burlap_sack.d: A physical block which holds items like the bundle
advancement.beansbackpacks.decorated_pot: Now holds 2 double chests worth of a single item; %d to insert or %d to take items
advancement.beansbackpacks.control.name: Controls
advancement.beansbackpacks.open_menu.des: Right click the bundle in the inventory
advancement.beansbackpacks.drag_pickup.d: Holding a bundle in your cursor, hold left click and drag to pickup all items
advancement.beansbackpacks.drag_place.de: Holding a bundle in your cursor, hold right click and drag to place items in empty slots
advancement.beansbackpacks.quick_store.d: Hold %d and click a item to move to your backpack, in any menu
advancement.beansbackpacks.pick_block.de: %d on a block extracts matching items from the backpack to your hand
advancement.beansbackpacks.pick_item.des: %d on a item in the inventory extracts matching items from the backpack to your cursor
advancement.beansbackpacks.place.name: Placing Backpacks
advancement.beansbackpacks.place.desc: Hold %d and click on a block to place a backpack
advancement.beansbackpacks.keybinds.name: Keybinds
advancement.beansbackpacks.keybinds.desc: Keybinds are customizable in the options
